item.title: Netflix’s Best New Show Has A Perfect 100% Rotten Tomatoes Score
item.description: The best new show to hit Netflix in a while has arrived with perfect scores from critics, but it may not be for everyone, given its subject matter.

item.title: Are We Heading Into Another AI Winter?
item.description: AI has faced boom and bust cycles. Learn what defines an AI winter, why past crashes happened, and whether today’s advances can prevent another freeze...

item.title: ‘South Park’ Season 27 Shifts Release Schedule Through September
item.description: More delays are planned for Trey Parker and Matt Stone’s "South Park" Season 27 after two breaks in the first three weeks.

item.title: Apple iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro Release Date Latest Schedule: What To Expect When
item.description: The countdown to the iPhone 17 series is on, and the first day in the schedule is just hours away.

item.title: The Clash Between Science And Common Sense Through A Weather Lens
item.description: Using the perspective of weather and climate, a scientist explores the conflict between science and common sense.
